I've played more CSGO but this game is more challenging to me in terms of mechanics. CSGO is sort of easy compared to this game.

I enjoy this game massively. But thats for nostalgia. Server are all pretty bad. Cheaters have it easy and many mods are just too difficult to get into. So for new players: no.

Anyone still wanting to relive this milestone of gaming: yes.
A classic which never gets old.
